lead_paragraph: From a cabin in Iceland, the British artist James Merry shares his process of embroidering vintage sportswear with natural designs, which he will demonstrate at Opening Ceremony next week.

headline.main: Where Athletic Apparel Meets Flowers and Fungi

snippet: From a cabin in Iceland, the British artist James Merry shares his process of embroidering vintage sportswear with natural designs, which he will demonstrate at Opening Ceremony next week.
